title: Software Engineer, Merchant Health Experience
content:
Who we are
About Stripe
Stripe is a financial infrastructure platform for businesses. Millions of companiesâ€”from the worldâ€™s largest enterprises to the most ambitious startupsâ€”use Stripe to accept payments, grow their revenue, and accelerate new business opportunities. Our mission is to increase the GDP of the internet, and we have a staggering amount of work ahead. That means you have an unprecedented opportunity to put the global economy within everyoneâ€™s reach while doing the most important work of your career.
About the team
The Merchant Health Experience Teamâ€™s mission is to provide Stripeâ€™s Enterprise customers with personalized, real-time and actionable data and insights on the health, status and performance of their Stripeâ€™s accounts, Stripeâ€™s systems and services, and Stripeâ€™s network partners. The team builds all the data infrastructure and machine learning models to support real-time alerting, dashboards, actionable insights and service performance reports. 
What you will do
Scope, design, implement, and deploy robust scalable solutions, making appropriate tradeoffs between reliability, throughput, latency, resiliency, engineering velocity and cost
Solve complicated problems that exist at the intersection of technology, scale, and people.
Contribute to teamâ€™s strategy, roadmap, tooling, process, and culture
Uphold our high engineering standards and improve our codebase and processes
Debug production issues across services and several layers of the stack
Heavily participate and contribute to various design discussions and code reviews within your team.
Minimum requirements
4+ years of professional hands-on software development experience, able to write highly optimized algorithms and have experience with commonly used data structure and algorithms
Hands-on experience designing and building large scale distributed systems 
Strong collaboration skills, can work cross-team and cross-organization to deliver integrated observability and alerting solutions
Customer obsessed, ability to articulate and represent customer experience in various forums to drive the right outcome 
BS or MS in Computer Science or equivalent field
Have the ability to thrive on a high level of autonomy, responsibility, and think of yourself as entrepreneurial
Preferred qualifications
Experience building and operating highly-scalable data-intensive services. 
Experience building and operating observability solutions, such designing/building telemetry collections, data transport and storage solutions and anomaly driven by machine learning models.

questions.label: Please select the country where you currently reside.
Please select the country or countries you anticipate working in for the role in which you are applying.
Are you authorized to work in the location(s) you selected in your previous response?
Will you require Stripe to sponsor you for a work permit now or in the future for the location(s) you selected in in your previous response?

questions.description: Stripe is currently operating in a hybrid work environment. In-office expectations for office-assigned Stripes vary by team. A remote location, in most cases, is defined as living 50 miles or more from an office location. While you would be welcome to join the office for team or business meetings when necessary, the expectation would be that you would regularly work from home rather than a Stripe office location. Stripe offices are located in Amsterdam, Bangkok, Bengaluru, Berlin, Chicago, Dubai, Dublin, Jakarta, London, Madrid, Mexico City, New York City, Paris, São Paulo, Singapore, South San Francisco, Seattle, Tokyo, and Toronto. Stripe does not cover the cost of relocating to a remote location. We encourage you to apply for roles that match the location in which you live or have intentions to live.
questions.label: If this role offers the option to work from a remote location, do you plan to work remotely?

values.label: Yes, I intend to work remotely.
No, I intend to work from an office location.
